tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE privacy_compliance_metrics (
    company_id INT NOT NULL,
    regulation_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    assessment_date DATE NOT NULL,
    risk_rating INT,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
  log_id SERIAL,
  organization_id UUID,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  action_taken VARCHAR(100),
  user_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE privacy_metrics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  regulation_type TEXT NOT NULL,
  data_type TEXT NOT NULL,
  total_records INT,
  compliance_status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_issues (
  issue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  regulation_type TEXT NOT NULL,
  data_type TEXT NOT NULL,
  issue_description TEXT,
  resolved BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE audit_log (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  regulation_type TEXT NOT NULL,
  data_type TEXT NOT NULL,
  action TEXT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE privacy_compliance_metrics (
    organization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation VARCHAR(50),
    data_type VARCHAR(50),
    data_access_count INT,
    data_protection_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE data_protection_regulations (
    regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_name VARCHAR(50),
    regulatory_body VARCHAR(50),
    compliance_deadline DATE
)

CREATE TABLE organization_details (
    organization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    organization_name VARCHAR(100),
    industry VARCHAR(50),
    contact_email VARCHAR(100),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE data_access_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    organization_id INT,
    data_accessed_time TIMESTAMP,
    data_owner VARCHAR(100),
    accessed_by VARCHAR(100),
    access_method VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_issues (
    issue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    organization_id INT,
    regulation_id INT,
    issue_description VARCHAR(200),
    resolution_status VARCHAR(50)
)
